query: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(column_name ORDER BY ordinal_position SEPARATOR ', ') as all_cols FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = DATABASE() AND table_name = 'sales';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3p9fhY9wEnC59QX.root --database kez2oyxfSHFekZFiUAQt4p --execute SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(column_name ORDER BY ordinal_position SEPARATOR ', ') as all_cols FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = DATABASE() AND table_name = 'sales';

rows.all_cols: id, userId, productName, productCategory, quantity, unitPrice, totalAmount, saleDate, customerName, orderReference, createdAt, saleType, paymentGateway, emailMarketing, smsMarketing, customerEmail

all_cols
